definition: uncle/father's younger brother/husband's younger brother/Taiwan pr. [shu2]

sentences.english: My uncle sent me a large bundle on my birthday.
sentences.chinese: 我生日時叔父給我寄來一個大包裹。

sentences.english: His uncle was disabled in the civil war, he lost his left arm.
sentences.chinese: 他的叔父在內戰中失去了一條左臂，成了殘廢人。

sentences.english: He got the job mainly because his uncle had lots of pull with the president.
sentences.chinese: 他得到這份工作主要因爲他叔父與總裁關係很好。

sentences.english: At nine o'clock I heard my uncle's latchkey in the hall door.
sentences.chinese: 九點鐘時我聽到叔父用彈簧鑰匙開門廳。

sentences.english: Prince Hamlet knows that his uncle Claudius murdered the king his father.
sentences.chinese: 哈姆萊特王子知道他的叔父克勞狄斯謀害了他的父王。

sentences.english: Hamlet revenged his father's death on his uncle.
sentences.chinese: 哈姆雷特向他叔父報了殺父之仇。

sentences.english: The King avenged his father on his uncle.
sentences.chinese: 國王向叔父報了殺父之仇。

sentences.english: The orphan was consigned to her uncle's care.
sentences.chinese: 那孤兒託給她叔父照料。

sentences.english: On the other side, the clouds break out of an encirclement, die crazy rescued seriously uncle cloud deep.
sentences.chinese: 另一邊，雲狂冒死突圍，救出了重傷的叔父雲深。

sentences.english: Hamlet revenged himself on his uncle, for his father's death.
sentences.chinese: 哈姆雷特向叔父報了殺父之仇。

sentences.english: Uncle feel let cloud deep eat hardship is also good.
sentences.chinese: 叔父覺得讓雲深喫喫苦也是好的。

sentences.english: John, my next uncle, was bred a dyer, I believe of wool.
sentences.chinese: 二叔父約翰是學染工，我相信是毛織品的染工。

sentences.english: His uncle agreed that it was a good idea.
sentences.chinese: 比爾的叔父認爲這個想法不錯。

sentences.english: I don't want to end up like my father or my two dead uncles.
sentences.chinese: 我不想象父皇和死去的兩個叔父那樣終其一生。

sentences.english: His uncle left him a legacy of $50,000.
sentences.chinese: 他叔父給他留下五萬元遺產。

sentences.english: My grandfather and uncle were forced to return to their village until his recovery.
sentences.chinese: 祖父和叔父被迫返回他們的村莊療傷。

definition: elder brother/term of respect for a man of about the same age
father's elder brother/term of respect for older man/CL:個|个[ge4]
older male cousin via female line
